summary: **Judge Judy** was an American TV show where former judge Judith Sheindlin helped people solve real-life arguments. It aired from 1996 to 2021 and was very popular, winning three Emmy Awards. The show revived the courtroom genre and had the most seasons of any single-run court show. Sheindlin even got a Guinness World Record for her work. Two spin-offs, **Judy Justice** and **Tribunal Justice**, have also been made.
title: Judge Judy
